Uses of Package
org.akubraproject

Packages that use org.akubraproject
org.akubraproject The Core Akubra API. 
org.akubraproject.fs Filesystem-backed implementation. 
org.akubraproject.impl Akubra store implementation support classes. 
org.akubraproject.map Akubra Id Mapping Implementation. 
org.akubraproject.mem Simple in-memory store. 
org.akubraproject.mux Abstract base classes for Multiplexing stores. 
org.akubraproject.qsc Akubra Quiescing Store. 
org.akubraproject.rmi The Akubra RMI API. 
org.akubraproject.rmi.client The Akubra RMI Client side wrappers for remote stubs. 
org.akubraproject.rmi.remote The Akubra RMI rpc definitions. 
org.akubraproject.rmi.server The Akubra RMI server side implementations. 
org.akubraproject.tck This package provides a basic TCK. 
org.akubraproject.txn Helpers and base classes for transactional stores. 
org.akubraproject.txn.derby Transactional store using Derby. 
org.akubraproject.www A store that represents the World Wide Web. 
 

Classes in org.akubraproject used by org.akubraproject
AkubraBlobException
          A common superclass for exceptions that relate to a specific blob.
AkubraException
          The base exception class for all exceptions thrown by a Akubra compliant store.
Blob
          Interface to abstract the idea of a blob in the blob store.
BlobStore
          Interface to abstract the idea of a general transaction based blob store
BlobStoreConnection
          Interface to abstract the idea of a connection to a transaction based blob store
DuplicateBlobException
          This exception is thrown by a blob store in case of an attempt to overwrite an existing blob in the store.
MissingBlobException
          This exception is thrown by a blob store in case in of missing blob in store.
UnsupportedIdException
          This exception is thrown by a blob store to indicate that the application supplied blob identifier is outside the set of all possible identifiers for blobs in this store.

BlobStore

BlobStoreConnection
          Interface to abstract the idea of a connection to a transaction based blob store
